original_text: And that whosoever would not come within three days, according to the counsel of the princes and the elders, all his substance should be forfeited, and himself separated from the congregation of those that had been carried away.
korean_text: 누구든지 방백들과 장로들의 훈시를 따라 삼일 내에 오지 아니하면 그의 재산을 적몰하고 사로잡혔던 자의 모임에서 쫓아내리라 하매

sentences.original_text: And that whosoever would not come within three days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사흘 안에 오지 않을 자는

sentences.original_text: according to the counsel of princes and the elders
all his substance should be forfeited
and himself separated from the congregation
of those that had been carried away
